title: SpaceX and Elon Musk explain potential reasons for Starship loss
summary:
SpaceX and its CEO Elon Musk are starting to shed some light on the potential reasoning for the loss of Starship yesterday, which was lost after a successful launch and catch of the lower-stage booster. Starship was lost during its ascension, and debris rained down over the Caribbean less than an hour after SpaceX lost […]
The post SpaceX and Elon Musk explain potential reasons for Starship loss appeared first on TESLARATI.
